content.detailedDescription:
While travelling west on s 272nd street, around 8pm. 
witnessed green orb or disk travelling west toward ocean.
as seen through my windsheild while driving.
the green light was not a clearance light from an aircraft having built many at boeing.
the light moved in a straight course and went out of site.
only lasted maybe 5 seconds.
may have been on local news.
content.summary: Fast moving greeen orb or disk

content.detailedDescription: I sent you a link to a video on utube also. i noticed the light on november 15, 2009 @ 1:30a.M. it was directly to the south of me. i live in brandon, fl by i-75 and causeway blvd. the light appeared to be above the sun city center area at first, by the end of the night it was over apollo beach or the sky way bridge, i know thats a big differance but i'm not a pilot so i'm not really sure were its location would be. i checked were the international space station was at that time, i also checked were gps and other satellites were at that time and they were not in the area. some of the pictures are blured because i didnt have the camera on a tripod. i have a good camera its a sony 15x optical zoom 8.1 mega pixels. i took the pictures on my porch that has a screen on it. if you could check out the pictures and video and let me know what you think i would appreciate it. thanks chris.
content.summary: Path of object.

content.detailedDescription: I was working at an aircraft facility (gulfstream) as an aircraft structure tech. (contractor) for the research and development dept.I had gone home to my travel trailer at the trailer park after work,took my shower, watched tv, and later that night got hungry and didn't feel like cooking so late at night, so i decided to go to wendy's for a midnight snack. the approximate time was about 1 am. i'm not sure of the exact date/month, (its been 8 years since i experienced this). while driving my van back to my temp home away from home i saw a strange orange glowing object, shaped like a large m&m over the tree line a few miles from where i was driving.(i was heading west)it was very dark out and clear, it slowly hovered over the tree line in a southerly direction until it got almost in a direct line with the road i was on, but still miles away. it stopped then rotated at about a 70 degree angle,it waited a few seconds i could then see that it was a round saucer shape, but as i say like an m&m shape on the side view. it then accelerated at an unbelievable speed up into the clear night sky and out of sight. i build and worked on aircraft for the past 30+ years and was an aircraft mechanic in the navy for 6 years onboard the carrier nimitz and stationed at patuxent river maryland at the naval air test center.I know the capabilities of jet aircraft and the speeds they can attain. nothing i've ever seen could accelerate that fast, and it didn't leave a fire trail as a jet would do during night ops. i was excited, stunned and in awe at the object and how fast this object went. within seconds of the object leaving, another one came from the northern side of the tree line and did the exact same manuver, leaving at unbelievable speed. during the second object sighting i floored the gas to get closer. i was driving about 80 mph trying to get a better look to confirm exactly what it was? then a third object with the same glowing orange color as the first two appeared and did the exact same maneuver the other two did till it was out of sight. i had no camera, i actually looked for someone else on the road to stop them and make them look at what i was seeing. there were no other cars on the road. this all happened near i believe its hunter airforce base or fort stewart. i know one of those facilities is in that area. i went to work the next day and told the guys at work. as i expected they asked what i was drinking when i saw these objects. i don't drink ! i didn't like the ridicule so i just kept my mouth shut and didn't tell anyone else about it. i've kept this mostly secret the past 8 years, i have told a few people about it, and my family knows of it. but to protect my status as an aircraft technician and not being labeled crazy i kept quiet about it. i'm convinced that what i saw was either from another world, another time, or some super secret thing the government is hiding.(i doubt the government could ever have a craft like that hidden) no jet aircraft that i know of could ever reach that type of speed so quickly and be out of sight in mere seconds as all three of the objects did. i watched them go so fast till they went out of human sight. plus the fact of the "g's that would have been experienced by any occupants of a craft going at that speed from a dead stop to out in space, would be phenominal. i truly believe they were from another world, highly intelligent, and curious about us. anyone who thinks that we are alone in this vast universe needs to rethink what they believe. we are just a speck in the vast expanse of the universe. with billions of planets in a galaxy, and millions of galaxies in the universe, you'd have to be pretty closed minded not to think about the odds that there is other intelligent life out there. perhaps smarter than we are and able to explore other planets.(which we can't even do yet) and because of the concept of fear to the public, the government will keep it hush hush about any other life out there that they may know about to prevent panic. my guess is they already know !!! it convinced me seeing them and i believe now !!! i wonder what they are like?
content.summary: Driving home saw 3 separate glowing objects slowly hover over tree line, then leave upwards at tremendous speed.

content.detailedDescription:
i was driving north on pa interstate 79 at 70mph. the
   time was approx. 10:15 am. it was a partly sunny morning
   with blue sky and scattered cumulus clouds. since it was
   saturday, there was less traffic and i was able now
   and then to look up over the horizon. this area is one of 
   flat farm land and rolling hills scattered small cities nearby. 
   i was about 2 mi. s of interstate 80 and the clarion exit.

                                   

 
     i happened to glance above the distant treeline and saw 
   a brilliant  sphere at one clock position. it was probably 
   about two or three miles away. i kept trying to watch it as i 
   was driving and it seemed to be motionless. there were no
   shadows.  it didn't pass through any clouds. 

     this sphere was silver with what appeared to be some
   kind of short nubs on the side which may have been part
   of a ring around the middle. i couldn't tell but they 
   were too short to be airplane type wings. there were
   no blinking lights. i was able to watch it for about 
   15/20 sec. i lost track of it as i came up a rise in 
   the highway and trees then obscured my view to the east.
   when i had another clear view i didn't see this object
   anywhere.  i doubt it was a plane. i come from a family
   who owned private aircraft and who were in the field of
   aviation so i know a few things about planes. 

     i didn't report this earlier in order to think about what
   i saw. although i have believed for many years in ufo's
   i haven't been looking for one ( even though i live in
   westmoreland co.! )
content.summary: very brilliant  hovering sphere which seemed to have band around middle

content.detailedDescription: On nov.6,09 at approximately 5;30 pm my son david and i went out of house to observe the aircraft that were flying over creating all the noise. we saw about 20 fighters jets bussing the skys of our town. this has never happened in the four years we have live here. it was quite scary, because the jets looked like a bunch of angary bees. we watched for about 10 minutes and went back into the house convinced they were playing some war games.  about 5 minutes later marys car pulled into the driveway.  i took her mail out to her,as i pickup her mail from her postal box.  phyllis was with mary,both ladies steped out of the car to observe the planes that were making all the noise. my son david pointed to the northeast and said what is that. whereupon i looked and saw a big black triangle with 3 red lights,one on each tip. mary and pyllis became very excited as well as i and david. we were all talking at once about what we were seeing. this object just seemed to glide along quite slowly unconcerned about all the jets bussing around it like a bunch of angry bees. the object was huge the size was unbeliveable.  it took abnout 4 minutes to pass headed toward the southeast.
content.summary: Myself and four other people saw a flying triangle surrounded by about 20 fighter jets.

content.detailedDescription:
This is not my first sighting in the same area. both sightings were in the evening when it was dark, and the weather was cool. both times i was driving home from harrisburg, pa to newport, pa on interstate 322 west.

on friday evening november 13, 2009, i was driving home from harrisburg, pa, toward newport, pa on route 322 west. i was between the watts and midway exits. above the mountain prior to the midway exit, i saw what i thought was the moon behind the clouds. then, i noticed that there was more that one light. the size of the lights that i saw made me think that they might have come from people spotting for deer. 

i realized that it wasn't the moon nor hunters, when i saw five or six lights in a row. the lights were above the clouds, so they could not have been people spotting for deer. 

i liken the size of the lights to be the size of large spot-lights. they were not bright like spot-lights. the colors were pale blue, white, and pale red. there was a small dim light centered and behind the larger lights. this light was a very dim, pale blue. it appeared that the craft was travelling in the direction of the row of lights, as though that were the front of the craft. it seemed to be slow moving.

i know that i am not an expert on ufo sightings, but i have seen my share of helicopters and airplanes. i grew up in close proximity to the former new cumberlan army depot. my father was a rotor mechanic. i do not belive for one moment that what i saw was an airplane or a helicopter. 

approximately six or seven years ago, i saw something in the sky at the same area. instead of flying above the mountain, it was hovering above the edge of the juniata river. i do not remember the month. it was when the weather was cool. there were no other cars around me, so i slowed down to between thirty-five and forty miles per hour, rolled down my windows, turned of my heater and radio to see if i could hear anything. i thought that it might be a helicopter looking for someone in the river. however; i realized that there was no search light. there were three, small, dim lights which made a triangular shape. the color of the lights were pale red, white and pale blue.

the craft made no sound. it hovered in the same spot from the time i spotted it in the distance, and while i slowed down to observe it. i don't know what it did after i got scared and sped up as fast as i could to get away from it.
content.summary: One side had 5 or 6 lights. about spotlight sized, but not that bright. there was one faded light to the center rear.

content.detailedDescription:
I was on rt. 30 west going into greensburg, and around the intersection of mountain view inn, i noticed what appeared to be two birds seemingly "fighting" each other over the highway.  as i drove closer, with traffic full on both sides of the highway, red lights drew my attention upwards to these "birds", which were spinning, rotating, and circling each other.
  as i passed directly under of the objects, i clearly made out a five-pointed star-shape from viewing underneath. circular-ringed ridges were on the body, emanating from the center point of the craft outward.   my very first reaction at this was that it was some sort of r.C. airplane, but then it dawned on me, these were extremely low in comparison with the tops of nearby trees.
  i pulled over in the middle of the road, next to the dividing barrier, and tried to film what i could. trees are somewhat in the way in the film.  1 minute and 30 seconds of film shot, with only about 15 seconds of "good" footage of the crafts.
the "backs" of these crafts had a giant red light, approx. 3 ft in heighth and 6 ft in length, with vertical rows of lights that would flash from side-to-side. 
  as it flew away, the two crafts appeared to fly unsteady or unstable, wobbling and tilting from side-to-side as it flew off.

  it headed off first south, but then veered in a south-westernly direction, and i attempted to chase it by following road in that general direction, but i never caught another glimpse of them.
content.summary: Two seperate, five-pointed star-shaped crafts cross rt. 30 in broad daylight

content.detailedDescription: my friend and i were "observing" with a 15cm(6")newtonian telescope and large binoculars, looking at star clusters, "m" objects,and the like. my friend who was holding the  70mm  binos pointed north with a sweep of his arm and raised the binocular to his eyes. i saw a large (but not bright) triangular shaped object passing overhead. he passed me the binos and i saw the object for about 10 more seconds, as it became fainter and disappeared into the northeast.   i had the impression (through the binos)that the large object was made up of a  number of smaller triangular objects. there was no sound of any kind,(such as you would expect to hear from migratory birds such as geese,or a formation of aircraft). my feeling was that the object (or objects) were only faintly illuminated by the lights of  my small town.It had a dull  gray quality.  my friend and i were experienced amateur astronomers, with hundreds of hours of time spent at the eyepieces of our telescopes and binos. we were completely baffled by this unexpected sighting. lastly, i believe the object subtended about 1 and 1/2 degrees,or about three times the apparent diameter of the moon.
content.summary: Large triangular object passed over my  friend and me

content.detailedDescription: Travelling east on i-40 just east of statesville, nc at 9:50 pm noticed a triangular craft approx 30 feet long on each side hovering above a farm field and easily observable by other traffic on interstate. slowed and observed the craft was motionless, approx at tree level, with no noticeable turbulence indicating propwash or downdraft. craft had bright red light at each corner (3) and these lights lit the bottom of the craft. am absolutely certain not a helicopter or fixed wing aircraft. other drivers appeared to slow to look at craft.
content.summary: Grey metallic triangle w red light at each corner hovering

content.detailedDescription: We have turned into the intergallactic cogo's. everyone is stopping by for a visit. there are all sorts of things flying around out here and landing. why doesn't mufon investigate? i know countless witnesses from the murrysville area have contacted mufon. what are you afraid of? is mufon just a way for the government to collect info from the general public? is the joke on us?
content.summary: Still waiting....

content.detailedDescription: My 8 year old son and i were out on our back deck about 6:35 pm.  he said "look at those bright stars"  i looked and thought those were too bright for stars.  just then the two stars moved about an inch or so at great speeds and i thought at that distance they couldn't be an airplane. a third gently came to light just as bright.  they formed a triangle for a minute maybe minute and a half. we just stared because we never saw "stars" move or fade in and out of brightness like that.  the trianle moved into a straight formation for about a minute or 1.5 minutes. this is the second "star like" movement i have seen in the last two years.  i live near a regional airport so i am very familiar with night flights and lights of planes. these moved to fast for any planes i have  seen or heard of.  i would like to know if anyone else has seen these lights in the northern nashville area on this date as well.  thank you for your site.
content.summary: Two bright lights apart then a third appeared.  in a short time these lights began to move.

content.detailedDescription: Detailed on video
content.summary: See video

content.detailedDescription:
I went to the window of my house and leaned out to look for my cat.
it was dark at about 9.30pm. immediately i saw something in the sky just above the tree line in an easterly direction. at first i thought what the hell is that, then i thought it might be a house on a mountain but i knew straight away that there are no mountains in that direction. as i watched facinated, i could make out 2 lights coming from what appeared to be large windows. the shape was curved on top with a flat bottom and rounded ends, the windows equally spaced either side of the centre. the object remained completely staionary and i guess it was about 1km away. at that distance it must have been atleast 100metres wide. after about 25 seconds the lights slowly faded, over about 5 seconds and it was gone.
however while it was still visible the road outside my house seemed to be illuminated as if a car was shining it's headlights towards to object.
as it faded the outline of the tops of the trees, near my house, became visible once again. i have no logical explanation for what i saw and really believe it was a craft of some kind.
content.summary: Object  1 km away, 2 lights, 100metres wide, above tree line, faded in 5 seconds

content.detailedDescription: I was just starting to go to bed for school one night. i don't remember what year or month. i was lying in bed looking out my bedroom window and had just covered up when i saw something large with red lights outside. my first thought was of the u.F.O. i had seen several years prior. i knew this wasn't a common experience and was freaked out by now possibly seeing a second one. i once again ran out the back door and this time into the yard. what i saw was a black or darkened disc shaped object moving once again in a southeastern direction. it had one ring of red lights around the outer edge and one red light in the dead center of the underside. it was only the underside i could see of the craft. it was rotating and moving at a good speed. visually it was about an inch and a half wide. the object made on sound. it passed behind the same trees in my backyard and i lost sight of it. i came back in and told my dad i'd seen another u.F.O. he seemed a bit less skeptical, but there wasn't much to be done. i went back to bed and hoped not to have nightmares. other than that, i suffered no changes.
content.summary: A black disc shape with red lights around the outer edge and one red light in the center.

content.detailedDescription: This object flew into view behind my house in ne ohio on sept. 9 2009 while i was sitting out back at around 8:30 to 9 pm. from the ground with the naked eye i thought it was the lights of an airplane, but it stopped and stood still in one spot for at least a half hour. when i went back in the house after taking the photos, it was still hovering so i don't know exactly how long it was there. after about 10 minutes i grabbed my fuij digital camera and took a series of 8 photos a few seconds apart. i could not make out any shapes, only flickering lights, with the naked eye and the screen on the camera. it wasn't until i zoomed in on the object in photoshop that i could see the shapes of the object. the ufo was changing shapes as i took the photos. i would have taken more photos if i knew that this was what i would find when i zoomed in on it. i think that the colorization of the ufo is very similar to the those in some of the recent kumburgaz ufo videos. i have the original unzoomed photos, they are about 1 mb each, taken at about 3 megapixel resolution. unfortunately my camera was not set at full resolution or the photos would have been much better. you can view the full series of zoomed photos at my website at http://freshnuts.Wordpress.Com/2009/09/13/shape-shifting-ufo/
content.shape: Blimp,   Boomerang,   Cigar,   Chevron,   Cross,   Diamond,   Disc,   Fireball,   Oval,   Saturn-like,   Sphere,   Square,   Rectagular,   Other,   Unknown
content.summary: Shape shifting worm-like ufo

content.detailedDescription:
I was lying in bed and trying to unsuccessfully get to sleep sometime in september of 1986. it was a clear night and there was, if not a full moon, a nearly full one because the sky was very bright. i could see through the blinds out my window quite well. i saw something very large and bright in the sky with different colors moving. i jumped up ran to the back door and stood on the porch. it was, as close as i can describe, like someone had wadded several strands of christmas tree lights together and made all the lights touch. there was no space between the lights but they were noticeably separate. i can't be sure of the distance from me, but it was passing above the trees with no sound. it's visual size was roughly two and a half inches from front to back. it did not rotate. i can't tell you it's speed, but in the patch of open sky in my back yard it was visible for about a minute from the time i saw it out the window till it left sight. it was traveling in a generally southeastern direction. i remember thinking that i was seeing a u.F.O. i didn't know if it was an alien space craft or something from the government, but being a child i hoped it was aliens. it passed behind more trees and i lost sight of it. my father came outside after it had passed and asked me why i was outside at that time of night. i told him i saw a u.F.O. and he said i'd probably dreamed it. i don't have waking dreams and i don't believe i would have seen it in the window and then again outside. 
afterward i felt confused, excited and somewhat frightened by the experience. i guess everyone's read something about u.F.O.'s at some point in their life, but to actually see one was another matter. i became interested in the history of them afterward and read all the material i could find.
content.summary: An amorphous mass of multi-colored lights with no real shape.

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i were visiting point pleasant, wv on sept 19 - 20 for the 8th annual mothman festival.  along with activities such as a new  documentary release of interviews related to mothman and ufo sightings back in the 60s, lectures of related interest to the paranormal (including one by a mufon rep), there were also scheduled hayrides through the abandoned us army ordnance works, better known to the residents of point pleasant and mothman enthusiasts everywhere as the infamous tnt area, adjacent to the state's farm museum.  

i took pictures of the surrounding area as the haywagon looped around the long-abandoned structures in the tnt section and saw nothing unusual at the time, around 7 p.M. on saturday.  upon my return home, i downloaded the pictures and was amazed to see orbs in many of the photos.  one picture taken after the ride was of a two-story outhouse (i just had to have a close-up picture) that is part of the state farm museum's building collection.  in the photo, i noticed for the first time an unusual small, bright light in the sky to the left of the outhouse.  the light didn't seem like that of a planet or plane and i enlarged it out of curiosity.

as i focused in on the photo of the light, there appeared to be three separate fuzzy lights within the larger light object, two over top of another one, and seemed to form a triangle. i tried enlarging it even more and it took on a more oval shape with light around the edges. i've had several people look at the pictures, including a professional commercial photographer, and all agree it doesn't look like anything they've ever seen.
content.summary: 2009 mothman festival - ufo seen over tnt area

content.detailedDescription: Has my family left a leisure centre after swimming lessons we noticed a orange star like object slowly tacking across the sky in front of us, no noise present, people getting into an car commented on the object, what could it be? thats strange. we all took photos. it appeared the same as the object i witnessed last night and reported on the mufon website. the object traveled into the distance the traveled out of sight in an instant.
content.summary: Second siting of orange star like object tracking across sky, this time i got a photo

content.detailedDescription: When looking through the window of my house i observed a strange cloud over the city of porto alegre. the image was blurred and strange. i took two photos of the sighting. after analysis on my pc i was curious about what i observed. i used a photo editing software and after reduce glare and increase contrast a strange shape appeared bright.
content.summary: Invisible ufo on the city

content.detailedDescription: My sighting occurred while standing on the patio behind my house, having a cigarette. my two dogs were outside with me, running around the backyard and my wife was in the garage nearby. it was nearing dusk, so while it was not yet dark, there were some stars visible in the sky. i was watching a plane pass overhead when something lower in the horizon and to the north caught my eye. what i then saw was five orange glowing spheres flying in a 45 degree formation with each other, traveling from west to east. living along a plane route and being very familiar with seeing planes and helicopters flying over daily, i immediately knew that these were not planes, helicopters, or really anything i had ever seen before. it is very difficult to judge, but i would guess that the objects were flying at an approximate altitude of 1000 feet. the objects made no sound that i could discern, though the aforementioned plane's engines were still audible. the light source of the objects seemed to be emanating from the objects themselves (no body of a craft visible at all.) the objects traveled at a steady speed, flying slightly faster than a passing plane would be expected to. they stayed in a rigid 45 degree formation with each other with the exception of the "center" object falling slightly back for a short moment before falling back into formation, lending to the idea that these were five separate entities and not a single craft with five lights. i called to my wife to come quickly and see this, but by the time she got to where i was, the spheres had disappeared over the sight line of our house. the entire episode lasted no longer than 10-12 seconds. i would say the sighting gave me a feeling of "calm excitement" - i knew i was witnessing something quite out of the ordinary. but, given the short duration of the experience, coupled with the lack of any visible detail of the objects, it afterward did not feel like a "mind blowing" or life changing event. it was simply a highly interesting occurrence that, to me, lacks any sort of conventional explanation.
content.summary: Five glowing orange spheres flying from west to east in a 45 degree formation

content.detailedDescription:
My thai teacher friend, who has never really believed in ufo's was in her yard last night after sunset.  the sky was black.  she looked up to the east, and saw three long bright lights (she held up her fingers in a w with the middle finger pointing up).  she said it was very beautiful, with many colors.  

as she was watching, her neigbor came out and several others... and together they all stood and watched it... motionless... very high in the sky. all of them agreed it was nothing they could think of from this planet.

i first thought that maybe it was the iss... but that would not have stayed stationary.  

they watched about five minutes until it faded away... but "for a few minutes it was very bright" she said.  

she is now convinced... 'there are things up there'.  

it sounds to me a lot like a ufo picture i found on the internet from china, dated aug. 23, 2009. (attached) though i have not shown this picture to her yet.
content.summary: Three long lights in a v high up and many colors

content.detailedDescription:
Thanks to youtube, i came across several videos regarding the ufo sightings that occurred in the hudson valley.  i had mostly thought that my sighting was an isolated incident so i kept the story to just close friends.

now that i know i am only among many who saw this craft, i feel its time to tell my story.

location: lake walton road, hopewell jct, ny 12533

activity: me and two friends and their parents were shooting off some fireworks at my friends house.  4th of july was coming and we were testing some out to see how we would plan our fireworks show.  these were all class c fireworks, nothing fancy.

what happened:  we were lighting off the small stuff for a while ( bottle rockets, cakes, some rockets) and everything was normal.  my friend took out some of the "grand finale" items and we started to light them off.  these are called mortars.  basically its a cardboard tube with shells that you insert in and then the fuse hangs off the side.  these go the highest and look like mini versions of what you see on tv.

on the second round, we started to hear a very low sounding humming noise.  directly in front of us, a series of lights shaped in an arc came close.  we all immediately knew what this was.  the craft was easily 1000 feet long, it covered the majority of jefferson park which is a development on the other side of lake walton road.  the development has 16 or 17 houses at its width.

the craft was super low to the ground.  other than the lights, we couldn't make out any of its exact shape, but if i were to guess the object was a flattened out oval very wide at the length with little depth.  the lights along the edge were all different colors.  i mostly remember the reds, yellows and whites.  the lights were evenly spaced from each other and had some flikering to them.

the craft was 100% silent as it hovered there.  my friends dad comepletely flipped out, and ran inside to get a camera while his wife was screaming at the top of her lungs.  we lit off one more mortar to see what would happen and then heard a bang and the humming again.  the craft slightly rotated on axis and in a whoosh it was gone.  at this time the dad came out of the house with the camera and there was nothing there.

here is the odd part.  and this is the part that scares the crap out of me.  nobody said a word and for the most part, i have no memory from this point forward.  all i know is that i got on my bike and went home.  i was soaking wet with sweat.  

when i came home, i was very late.  i had a super strict father and i was amazed that my parents, who were downstairs watching tv said hello to me as if nothing was wrong.  i said i was tired and went to bed.  100% amazed that i was not in trouble.  we were lighting off the fireworks at 8pm and i think it was around 10:30pm or 11pm when i got home.  i'm not sure.

nobody in our group ever talked about the event.  about three years later i asked one of my friends about it and he said he didn't know what i was talking about.  he was a tough guy who worked in a gas station.

the point i want to make about this story is that i think the ufo was in the general area when we were lighting off the ground fireworks.  it was only when we sent the huge mortar into the sky that the craft approached.  as if it was examining the explosion.  when they figured out it was just us, it took off.

the speed at which the craft approached us and left is simply impossible.  something so large like that able to zap around at will without making much noise except the low humming noise is amazing.

if anyone wants to contact me regarding this event please feel free.  i am now 38 yrs old, i'm an executive in a large corporation and i would like to learn more about this event in my life.
content.summary: Hudson valley large 1000ft oval disk first hand account

content.detailedDescription: I took my dogs out for a walk approx. 10:30 pm. we live on top of a hill with a large woodland area close by. shortly into the walk i noticed a bright orange star like object in the sky, i thought at first it could be a police helicopter because it was a low altitude, however i could not hear any rotors, no sound at all, also no flashing lights. the object's movements were strange it seemed to move slowly in random flight path. this object tracked out of range and behind a cloud. at this point i dismissed it as anything. then another appeared. at this point i thought this is strange, i felt slightly scared, however at the same time excited at what i was witnessing. this light hovered directly in front of me for around five minutes, i could not believe what i was seeing. the dogs appeared scared so i took them back to my house, watching the object as i ran, it to faded into a cloud. i grabed a camera and went back to the area. when i got back to the area the objects had gone and the sky was clear, stars could be seen easily. at the time of witnessing these objects i noted several commercial airlines in this area at different altitudes.
content.summary: Two orange star like objects tracked across the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i were just walking in our neighborhood and saw something we can not explain.
i am posting this because neither of us can think of who you call and there have to be other people who saw this.
it was near a shopping area off the main road, but our neighborhood is still dark at night which we guess is why we could see the object.
it was black-ish with what looked like moving/flipping panels that would catch the light as it moved or reflected some light we could not see.
when he first saw it he thought it was birds, but there was no bird sound and then we both realized how large it was.
and that it was diamond shaped.
plus it was blocking out the sky as it moved.
as it moved away i could hear a hush noise, like snow flakes or a low white noise sound.
he did not pick that up, but we both know my ears are more sensitive and he is getting over a cold.
also as it moved away it turned into a triangular shape and we could really see the tile-like things flipping.
the object was moving overhead toward downtown, so a straight line following a major interstate seemed to be its path or to pass over it at some point. east-northeast(emphasis on east).
it left behind a massive white trail similar to what planes can leave behind but huge.
my husband wants me to add that it was not like an exhaust trail, but more like displacement?
no other way to explain how it looked or felt but displacement.
also as it was moving it passed in front of a plane that was much higher up and the object totally blocked the light out of the plane.
i always carry a strong flash light when we walk at night and it did not even reflect off of this object.
either it was much higher up, which means it was even larger than we think, or it was non-reflective.
we watched it from tonight 7:07 pm until 7:09 when it moved out of our field of vision.
it became a straight line like this but massively thick ______.
it seemed as though one of the diamond's points flattened to make the triangle and then the the front point of the triangle flattened to make a wide line.
the tile like things had the same visual light change that ticker tape or confetti does as it falls. 
also i had a wave of nausea with a metallic taste in my mouth just before my husband pointed the "birds" out to me.
the nausea just faded along with the odd taste.
that day had been clear, no cloud cover, and it was not windy that night.
in fact it was a oddly quiet evening for our neighborhgood.
so quiet that 2 neighbors came home while we were just standing out in the street and they unloaded their car as they would normally do.
if my husband had not looked up when he did we think we would never have noticed this thing at all.
it was that well blended against the sky.
content.summary: It was diamond shaped blended with the night sky changed shape as moved and had tile-like surface items moving

content.detailedDescription: A friend and i were outside at a bar smoking. i looked to the south and saw a large yellow pancake shaped light hovering in the sky. my girlfriend saw it to . it hovered still and had a moving light going across the front of it like the knight rider car. we both witnessed it hover for around 5 min before we went back inside. 20 min later we went to leave and it was gone. at first we thought it was the goodyear blimp. it did not move however and it was very strange.
content.summary: Strange yellow lights hovering

content.detailedDescription: I was outside answering a phone call, after a few minutes, i was looking up at the sky and something caught my attention. i thought it was a shooting star. then it got closer and i thought it was a plane, but it didn't look like any plane i've ever seen. it was boomerang shaped and had six light on the bottom that were all the same color, none of them blinked at all, they were like a faded yellow color, like a light bulb. it was very quiet and i could here it buzzing, it sounded like bees. it was moving at a constant speed, not slow or fast. it was coming from the south and was headed north. i watched for about 2 or 3 minutes and then ran under a canopy for a minute or so and then moved into the garage and i could still hear the buzzing noise. i ran into the house and called my cousin who went outside to look and she didn't see it all. i was very afraid. when i was watching it, i felt mesmerized and at the same time i was thinking it was beautiful and terrifying at the same time.
content.summary: Boomerrang shaped, 6 lights, same color, moving at constant speed

content.detailedDescription:
I viewed the light while looking straight up into the sky looking at stars and other aircraft. 

i was at home at the time and walking to my car to go to the mall.

i always look into the sky to identify aircraft, stars, satellites, planets and thought i was watching a satellite pass over at very high altitude.

the "glowing light object" looked exactly like a satellite, but was traveling
from south to north at satellite type speed, but maybe a little slower.

i decided the "object" was a satellite, but then the "object" began to get brighter very slow (1 second interval), i thought it was still a satellite, but then it became dim got brighter at the same interval again. the "object" did this 3 times. the 3rd time the "object" was brighter and completely disappeared. usually satellites travel completely across the sky in full view until they disappear across the horizon.

the "object" traveled in a smooth straight line until it disappeared. 

during the observation, i felt it had an intelligent possibly telepathic presence as if "the object" noticed it was being perceived by observation before disappearing.

i lost sight of the "object" when it disappeared.

after the sighting, i continued my journey to the mall. 

the "object" could be a satellite spinning, i suppose, but i don't have the resources to check this hypothesis.
content.summary: High altitude, satellite glow, brightened 3 times at 1 second intervals and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: As my mother was driving me home from dinner, we stopped at a traffic light. as we stopped, i looked out of my window i saw a triangle-shaped object at about 500 feet away. it was probably about 200 feet from end to end. the lights were a redish color and were located at each end of the triangle. at first i thought it was an airplane but it stood still and didn't flash it's red and blue lights.  i saw this object for about 2 minutes until my mother turned at the light and i lost sight of it behind some trees. when i returned home, i had a slight headache and stomach ache for the rest of the day. i believe i was the only witness in the area to the event.
content.summary: Motionless and bright.

content.detailedDescription: There were sightings nightly in roswell, georgia at the time, and i was out going to the grocery store, then the pharmacy, and as i was waiting to turn into the parking lot of the pharmacy, i looked up and saw a lightpost, and for no apparent reason then looked beyond it and saw 3 discs, or what i'd call flying saucers.  it didn't surprise me since there'd been so much talk with all the recent sightings.  they were just hovering, and it was a clear glimpse i got, too.  i don't question that they were ufos, i know that they were.  i know exactly what i saw.  i ended up just going about my business at the pharmacy and have never really spoken of the incident in fear of being deemed "crazy."  notice, i chose to remain anonymous!  that's because i still have that fear of being deemed "crazy."
content.summary: Three flying saucers

content.detailedDescription: I went outside to smoke before going to bed, and was standing on my porch ramp looking at the stars with my wife. we live in a very rural area, so it was very dark with a nice starfield. i happened to be looking in the right place at the right time. two yellow lights faded in in the northeastern sky, one just a little brighter than the other. i thought it might be an airplane at first, but i've never seen any airplane with yellow lights. they moved slowly, headed south, and were visible for about 30 seconds until they faded back out like they were never there.
content.summary: Two yellow lights faded in, moved and faded back out
